about_the_game:
In this turn-based tactical RPG you will take control of a hero from a different time and place, plucked out of their own reality and thrown into this realm. And now... meet the expectations of the people and become the all beloved hero or forge your own path and reshape the world to whatever your taste is.

Key features:

  • Turn-based battles with dozens enemies, abilities, statuses, triggers and effects.


  • Battle log and reconnaissance fog. It will take all your cunning and intuition to emerge victorious. Woe to those who seek victory through sheer force alone.

  • Customize your character. Choose gender, class, appearance and race.


  • 5 classes:
    - Warrior (Defender & Knight)
    - Hunter (Sniper & Ranger)
    - Mage (Warlock & Elementalist)
    - Priest (Inquisitor & Saint)
    - Rogue (Poisoner & Assassin)

  • An infinite number of randomly generated loot. Build your perfect death machine.

  • A flexible difficulty system. Will your enemies be penniless beggars or princes clad in shining armor? Will they be favorites of fate or cursed to perish at the hands of the hero? The choice is yours alone. And remember, the higher the risk, the greater the reward.


  • Abilities and weapons are not tied to a class. Create an assassin with a fireball, a knight with a staff, or a warlock healer.


  • Play along and become an epic hero who fights for justice or break the stereotypes and embrace chaos.

  • Two romance interest. Choose between pragmatic ice princess and mischievous demon queen… or maybe you are the greedy one?

name: Otherworld Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
